headline.title: Create a new asset
headline.description: Make sure you read the Comunity Guidelines before you create a new asset.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.description: Help us display your asset correctly.

array.label: Design
array.description: A digital asset, like an open source hardware project or 3D model

array.label: Service
array.description: A service, like a consultancy, training course or usage/rental of equipment

array.label: Product
array.description: A physical product that can be picked up or delivered

projectName.label: Asset name:
projectName.hint: Working name of the asset, visible to the whole community

projectDescription.label: Description:
projectDescription.placeholder: E.g. An open source laser cutter within you reach
projectDescription.hint: Short description to be displayed on the asset page
projectDescription.md-editor-explainer: in this markdown editor, the right box shows a preview. Type up to 2048 characters

repositoryOrId.label: Repository link or Interfacer ID:
repositoryOrId.hint: Reference to the asset's repository or Interfacer ID of the asset

imageUpload.label: Upload up to 10 pictures:
imageUpload.clickToUpload: Drag here or Click to upload

projectTags.label: Tags:
projectTags.hint: Press space to add a new tag

name.label: Location name:
name.hint: Name of the location where the asset can be found

price.label: Value in Fab Token:
price.hint: Value of the asset in Fab Token
